price: Dann würden Wir ihnen wahrlich von Uns aus großartigen Lohn geben
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
